com.moniuliuma.fingerprint

Interface Reader


  • public interface Reader
    Class represents fingerprint reader. Keeps information about reader hardware and capabilities. Provides means to capture fingerprints.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Reader.Capabilities
      Information about reader capabilites.
      static interface  Reader.CaptureCallback
      Returns a capture result.
      static class  Reader.CaptureQuality
      Constants describing result of the capture operation.
      static class  Reader.CaptureResult
      Complete result of the capture operation.
      static class  Reader.Description
      Complete information about reader hardware.
      static class  Reader.Id
      Reader Hardware ID.
      static class  Reader.ImageProcessing
      Constants describing image processing.
      static class  Reader.Modality
      Constants describing reader modality.
      static class  Reader.Priority
      Constants describing priority of the client opening the reader.
      static class  Reader.ReaderStatus
      Constants describing status of the reader.
      static class  Reader.Status
      Describes status of the reader.
      static class  Reader.Technology
      Constants describing reader technology.
      static class  Reader.Version
      Reader hardware version.
      static class  Reader.VersionInfo

    • Method Detail

      • Open

        void Open(Reader.Priority paramPriority)
   throws DeviceException
        Opens a reader.
        Parameters:
        paramPriority - Priority object
        Throws:
        DeviceException

      • Close

        void Close()
    throws DeviceException
        Releases the reader.
        Throws:
        DeviceException

      • GetStatus

        Reader.Status GetStatus()
                 throws DeviceException
        Returns status of the reader. To acquire status reader must be opened.
        Returns:
        Reader.Status object.
        Throws:
        DeviceException

      • GetCapabilities

        Reader.Capabilities GetCapabilities()
        Returns capabilities of the reader. To acquire capabilities reader must be opened.
        Returns:
        Reader.Capabilities object.

      • GetDescription

        Reader.Description GetDescription()
        Returns description of the reader. Reader does not have to be opened in order to acquire description.
        Returns:
        Reader.Description object.

      • Capture

        Reader.CaptureResult Capture(Fid.Format paramFormat,
                             Reader.ImageProcessing paramImageProcessing,
                             int resolution,
                             int timeout)
                      throws DeviceException
        Captures a fingerprint image. This function captures a fingerprint image from the opened reader device. This function signals the device that a fingerprint is expected and waits until a fingerprint is received. This function blocks until an image is captured, capture fails or timeout is expired. This function cannot be called in streaming mode.
        Parameters:
        paramFormat - Format of the image.
        paramImageProcessing - Processing of the image.
        resolution - Resolution of the image.
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds; -1 means no timeout (function will block until a fingerprint is captured).
        Returns:
        Reader.CaptureResult object.
        Throws:
        DeviceException

      • CaptureAsync

        void CaptureAsync(Fid.Format paramFormat,
                  Reader.ImageProcessing paramImageProcessing,
                  int resolution,
                  int timeout,
                  Reader.CaptureCallback paramCaptureCallback)
           throws DeviceException
        Captures a fingerprint image. This function captures a fingerprint image from the opened reader device. This function signals the device that a fingerprint is expected. This function calls the callback function when an image is captured, capture fails or timeout is expired. This function cannot be called in streaming mode.
        Parameters:
        paramFormat - Format of the image.
        paramImageProcessing - Processing of the image.
        resolution - Resolution of the image.
        timeout - Timeout in milliseconds; -1 means no timeout (function will block until a fingerprint is captured).
        paramCaptureCallback - Object implementing CaptureCallback interface to return a capture result.
        Throws:
        DeviceException

      • CancelCapture

        void CancelCapture()
            throws DeviceException
        Cancels pending capture.
        Throws:
        DeviceException

      • StartStreaming

        void StartStreaming()
             throws DeviceException
        Puts reader into streaming mode. Not all readers support this mode. When the reader is in streaming mode, the application can only call GetStreamImage() to acquire images from the stream.
        Throws:
        DeviceException

      • StopStreaming

        void StopStreaming()
            throws DeviceException
        Stops streaming mode.
        Throws:
        DeviceException

      • GetStreamImage

        Reader.CaptureResult GetStreamImage(Fid.Format paramFormat,
                                    Reader.ImageProcessing paramImageProcessing,
                                    int resolution)
                             throws DeviceException
        Takes an image from the stream. After the reader is put into streaming mode this function takes an image from the stream. After this function returns, the reader stays in the streaming mode. Frame selection, scoring or other image processing is not performed.
        Parameters:
        paramFormat - Format of the image.
        paramImageProcessing - Processing of the image.
        resolution - Resolution of the image.
        Returns:
        Reader.CaptureResult object.
        Throws:
        DeviceException

      • Calibrate

        void Calibrate()
        throws DeviceException
        Calibrates the reader. This function calibrates a reader and blocks until the calibration is complete. It can take several seconds to calibrate for some devices.
        Throws:
        DeviceException

      • Reset

        void Reset()
    throws DeviceException
        Resets the reader. This function performs a hardware reset on the reader. Hardware resets are typically needed only after a hardware problem (e.g., the reader is unplugged or receives an electrostatic shock). This function blocks until the reset is complete.
        Throws:
        DeviceException
